attributes.action: schools to have an armed security guard to prevent attempted child abductions
attributes.additional_details: I want them to pass this for the safety of our children
attributes.background: With the recent amount of attempted abductions within the UK I believe for the safety of our children we should have more safety measures in place when children are heading to and from school

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Provide funding for schools to hire a security guard to protect our children
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/715050
